channel.title: Elasticsearch on Kylin Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Elasticsearch on Kylin Blog

item.title: Elasticsearch的安装与配置
item.description: Elasticsearch的安装与配置 环境信息： centos、Elasticsearch2.1.1 安装 下载 curl -L -O https://download.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-2.1.1.zip 解压 yum install -y unzip zip unzip elasticsearch-2.1.1.zip 启动 cd elasticsearch-2.1.1
